name: spot-on-highlighter
description: Highlights text on web pages when hovered. Control via extension popup.

scripts.copy:static: cpx "manifest.json" dist && cpx "index.html" dist && cpx "popup.js" dist && cpx "content.css" dist
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:content && npm run build:background && npm run copy:static
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm-run-all --parallel watch:popup watch:content watch:background watch:static
